heroes.name: Iron Man
heroes.description: Iron Man is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. He is depicted as a wealthy, genius inventor, and business magnate.

heroes.name: Spider-Man
heroes.description: Spider-Man is a fictional superhero created by writer-editor Stan Lee and writer-artist Steve Ditko. He first appeared in Amazing Fantasy #15 in 1962.

heroes.name: Captain America
heroes.description: Captain America is a superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character was created by cartoonists Joe Simon and Jack Kirby.

heroes.name: Superman
heroes.description: Superman is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Jerry Siegel and artist Joe Shunter and first appeared in Action Comics #1 in 1938.

heroes.name: Batman
heroes.description: Batman is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created by artist Bob Kane and writer Bill Finger.

heroes.name: Wonder Woman
heroes.description: Wonder Woman is a super heroine appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character is a founding member of the Justice League.

heroes.name: Luke Skywalker
heroes.description: Luke Skywalker is a fictional character and the main protagonist of the original film trilogy of the Star Wars franchise. He is a Jedi Knight.

heroes.name: Darth Vader
heroes.description: Darth Vader is a fictional character in the Star Wars franchise. He is the main antagonist of the original trilogy and is known for his iconic black armor.

heroes.name: Yoda
heroes.description: Yoda is a fictional character in the Star Wars franchise. He is a legendary Jedi Master known for his wisdom, knowledge, and exceptional light saver skills.
